name: puppy string
description:
🐶🪀

a puppy finds himself lost in a cave, thankfully his trusty yoyo skills will come in handy for getting out!

-- controls --

  • move  -  wasd / arrow keys
  • aim  -  mouse
  • throw  -  click
  • activate ability  -  right click / space / shift / z / x
  • swap yoyos  -  Q + E / scroll
  • restart at checkpoint: R
  • reset save data and restart: shift+R (ctrl+shift+R on desktop)
